content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been successfully created on the map. Multiple attempts were made to craft and place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), but none were completed due to resource shortages and inventory issues.

ERROR TIPS
• API Call Consistency:
  - Use the correct signature for get_entities. Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or extra positional arguments.
  
• Lab Retrieval and Placement:
  - Before iterating over retrieved entities, confirm that the result is a valid list (not None).
  - Ensure that a Lab is available in the inventory before attempting to place one at a designated position.
  
• Crafting Resource Requirements:
  - Verify that all sub-ingredients for Lab crafting—including iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper cables—are available in sufficient quantities.
  - Strengthen resource production (e.g., smelting additional iron and copper plates) and confirm that the production chain (using furnaces and crafting machines) meets recipe requirements to avoid cascading crafting failures.
